Class UserDefinedFunction

Google BigQuery User Defined Function. BigQuery supports user-defined functions (UDFs) written in JavaScript. A UDF is similar to the "Map" function in a MapReduce: it takes a single row as input and produces zero or more rows as output. The output can potentially have a different schema than the input.

fromUri(String functionDefinition)

Creates a Google Cloud BigQuery user-defined function given a Google Cloud Storage URI (e.g. gs://bucket/path).

Type Description

getContent()

If #getType() is Type#INLINE this method returns a code blob. If #getType() is Type#FROM_URI the method returns a Google Cloud Storage URI (e.g. gs://bucket/path).
